notes.text:
After this iterator we should try to find the values for this:

Education ("Berufsqualifizierender Hochschulabschluss", "Andere Berufsgruppen", "Quereinsteiger")

Certificate Type

Problematic might be to recognize people who should only get a certificate after the extension of the course to 160 or 200 UE
This should run every weekday at 8:00
